TextBlock.Text: <Color=#00ffbc>detecting life nearing sun communication detected translation begun deploying first contact via local medium</Color>

<Color=#00ffbc>To Those Who Come After. Greetings from the past, may this message find you well. It has traveled far since I set it out upon an unknown astral sea. I know not who you are, reader, yet I hope a connection may here be made.</Color>

<Color=#00ffbc>I offer you in gift the </Color><Color=orange>Astral Codex</Color><Color=#00ffbc>, a collection of knowledge recorded and preserved eons before your time. It was the work of my life to bring this information to your light receptors. I desire that the minds that receieve be of curious nature that my loss has not been in vain.</Color>

<Color=#00ffbc>Seek the Lingering Chime, once your species has grown, and advanced, sufficiently to be worthy of the mission it bestows. May it grant you the </Color><Color=orange>Astral Codex</Color><Color=#00ffbc></Color>
